body_html:
No, the preparation would have been the geo data update and I already ran them in production. I can run the task in production now if you want, the command is approx. like this btw:

heroku run --app rgsoc-teams-production bundle exec rake selection:flag_applications

Do you want me to run it right away?
body_text:
No, the preparation would have been the geo data update and I already ran them in production. I can run the task in production now if you want, the command is approx. like this btw:
heroku run --app rgsoc-teams-production bundle exec rake selection:flag_applications
Do you want me to run it right away?
body:
No, the _preparation_ would have been the geo data update and I already ran them in production. I can run the task in production now if you want, the command is approx. like this btw:
```sh
heroku run --app rgsoc-teams-production bundle exec rake selection:flag_applications
```
Do you want me to run it right away?
